alert.note: Alert for Marinette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 5:59PM CDT until July 25 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Marinette County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crivitz, or 21 miles northwest of Marinette, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pound around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Coleman, Beaver, Porterfield, Loomis, Middle Inlet and Harmony. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
